sys_ux_client_script.name: New client script 1

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_cab69f17838d7210c386e5d0deaad3dc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="運用レポート">6ce1be9f83897210c386e5d0deaad39a</macroponent><name>New client script 1</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api,event,helpers,imports}) {
    // ボタンのスタイルを変更
    api.state.setValue('buttonStyle', {
        backgroundColor: '#4CAF50', // 緑
        color: '#fff'
    });

    // ボタンのテキストを変更
    api.state.setValue('buttonLabel', 'クリック済み！');

    // 通知も表示
    api.notifications.show({
        variant: 'success',
        message: 'ボタンがクリックされました！',
        duration: 3000
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_fujisawa_shouma</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-12 04:11:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>cab69f17838d7210c386e5d0deaad3dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New client script 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dashboard Test" source="x_1781293_dashbo_0">d397893183057210c386e5d0deaad37d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dashboard Test">d397893183057210c386e5d0deaad37d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cab69f17838d7210c386e5d0deaad3dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-13 00:12:55</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
